RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Grapple strength
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks influence the pawns capability of moving the bar in their favor during a vore grapple. These apply to both attacking and defending.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Professional Wrestler
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is an expert at hand-to-hand combat when it comes to wrestling for vore.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Wrestler
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] has some experience when it comes to wrestling.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Normal
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] has no special experience that affects grapple strength.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Weak grip
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] has issues when it comes to wrestling with [PAWN_possessive] opponents.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Carpal tunnel syndrome
